events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday afternoon and have just filed my insurance claim to cover the damages.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after review of the initial report provided with the filing.
An agent has been assigned to my accident claim to guide me through the next steps and provide necessary assistance.
I received confirmation from the insurance company acknowledging the receipt and registration of my auto accident claim.
The insurance company requested additional documents including the police report and photos of the vehicle damage.
I have submitted all requested documents such as the police report, vehicle photos, and medical bills for processing the claim.
The insurance company has initiated an investigation to verify the details of the car accident and damages claimed.
The investigation team has completed their assessment and provided a report confirming the extent of damages and liability.
The insurer proposed a settlement offer based on the damages assessed and coverage limits stated in my policy.
I provided feedback regarding the handling of my auto accident claim, noting both positive and areas for improvement.
My claim was officially approved by the insurance company after acceptance of the settlement offer.
The payment covering the agreed settlement amount for the auto accident damages has been issued to my bank account.
The claim process has been officially closed as all requirements have been met and payment was successfully received.
My auto accident claim documents and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
